subject: College Athletics
Football
Athletics and Sports
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: Matt Ryan did not win the Heisman Trophy and his Boston College team fell short of a Bowl Championship Series berth. But there was a final victory over Michigan State in the Champs Sports Bowl on Friday night.
snippet: Matt Ryan did not win the Heisman Trophy and his Boston College team fell short of a Bowl Championship Series berth. But there was a final victory over Michigan State in the Champs Sports Bowl on Friday night.
